title: Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine triggers stronger antibody levels with longer gap between shots – study
content:
1. Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine triggers stronger antibody levels with longer gap between shots – study  Seeking Alpha

  5. Israeli, UK data offer mixed signals on vaccine’s potency against Delta strain  The Times of Israel
